triples.evidence: The forward 2D Fourier transform...expresses it in terms of its spatial frequency components.
The inverse 2D Fourier transform takes that frequency-domain representation and reconstructs the original spatial-domain function.
The colors represent the amplitude of different spatial frequency components...
triples.o: amplitude of different spatial frequency components

evidence: The inverse 2D Fourier transform takes that frequency-domain representation and reconstructs the original spatial-domain function.
